# Beacon Blocker Dashboard

> Web dashboard to manage your Beacon Blocker extension settings.

## Purpose
The Dashboard allows users to configure their AI-powered content blocker, manage blocking rule presets, and review their browsing activity history.

## Features
- Custom blocking rules editor
- Save/Load preset profiles
- Activity log with AI reasoning
- Dark/Light theme support

## Links
- Main Website: https://beaconblocker.com
- Dashboard: https://beaconblocker.vercel.app
